summary.title: Personal Profile
summary.text: Built real-time defect-detection systems for industrial thermography, spanning data validation, model development, and edge-ready inference. I bridge applied CV with production constraints, delivering on-site deployments, customer demos, and measurable inspection gains. Recently led a 3-6 person AI team while shipping both real-time and post-processing models for field use.

items.title: Chief Technology Officer (AI & Data)
bullets: Owned the AI/data roadmap for thermographic defect detection, turning customer requirements into measurable acceptance criteria.
Shipped 2 real-time and 3 post-processing models for thermal-video welding defects; enabled on-site setup in ~30 minutes and updates in <1 minute.
Deployed GPU edge inference with a Django service layer and WebSocket integration for the customer-facing UI.
Led a 3-6 person ML/CV + software team and ran customer demos through production handoff.

items.title: R&D Scientist (Computer Vision)
bullets: Built thermography-based defect detection prototypes, including one-shot/low-data approaches for sparse labeling.
Designed validation, preprocessing, and error-analysis workflows for robust performance on real thermal runs.

items.title: Algorithm Development for Weld Path Optimization | Data Scientist Intern
bullets: Built an STL mesh processing and robotic weld path planning pipeline; achieved ~86% match vs reference trajectories.
Created visualization and debugging tooling to speed iteration and stakeholder reviews.

items.title: Statistical Analyst (Market Research)
bullets: Led survey analysis for market research studies, delivering segmentation insights and statistical testing reports.
Optimized data-processing steps in C++ to improve reliability and reduce runtime on larger datasets.

items.title: Data Analyst Intern
bullets: Analyzed 5,000+ student records across 10 years to identify drivers of employment outcomes.
Recommended interventions validated by simulation (+8.0%) and post-implementation improvement (+8.4%).

items.title: Master's Thesis - ML for Thermographic Analysis in Welding
items.subtitle: In collaboration with Therness S.r.l.
bullets: Built a thermographic analysis workflow and developed ML/DL models for welding defect detection and in-process quality monitoring.
Designed CV preprocessing and real-time inference approach for deployment on an on-prem edge device. (Code/data not public due to company confidentiality.)

items.title: Distributed & Federated Learning (CIFAR-100)
bullets: Implemented and benchmarked distributed/federated training, evaluating accuracy, scalability, and communication cost across client settings.
Prototyped efficiency techniques (layer freezing, adaptive local steps) for heterogeneous clients.

items.title: Optimized Voice Intent Detection for IoT Edge Devices
bullets: Developed a voice intent detection model using NLP and supervised learning for accurate intent classification on voice assistants.
Optimized the model for edge deployment by reducing size and improving latency on resource-constrained IoT devices.
Tech: Python, NLP, intent classification, edge deployment.

items.title: Predicting Dengue Fever with Regression Analysis
bullets: Built and validated regression models using meteorological covariates to forecast weekly dengue cases.
Produced interpretable insights on climate drivers to support early-warning analysis and public health planning.
Tech: regression, feature engineering, model validation (Python/R).
